## Vector3.GetAngleBetweenVectors() method

Get angle between two vectors

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static GetAngleBetweenVectors(vector0: Vector3, vector1: Vector3, normal: ReadOnlyVector3): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  vector0 | <code>Vector3</code> | angle between vector0 and vector1 |
|  vector1 | <code>Vector3</code> | angle between vector0 and vector1 |
|  normal | <code>ReadOnlyVector3</code> | direction of the normal |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`

the angle between vector0 and vector1
